pageTitle: Vet Dr. Ron Fox Bay Cities Animal Hospital Burlington
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4498=Dr. Ron Fox graduated from the Ontario Veterinary College, University of Guelph, in 1981. Following graduation he practiced in the Ottawa area before returning to the Ontario Veterinary College to further his studies. In 1985 he received a post graduate diploma in medicine and later that year joined Bay Cities Animal Hospital as a partner.                                                                       }
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {29377=Veterinarian Websites By VetMatrix Copyright ©2015 VetMatrix. All Rights Reserved.}
textBeforeTable: Office Hours review us. stay connected or maintains an active presence on many popular search and social media websites. Select your favorite website below to Bay Cities Animal Hospital Review Us Find us on Facebook Over the years Dr. Fox's house has been home to dogs, cats, hamsters, rats and fish. Dr. Fox and his wife Barb, have one daughter, Nicole, studying engineering at Queen's University and two cats, Millie and Eddie. Outside interests include skiing, baseball, active travel and time at the gym. In the past few years Dr. Fox and Dr. Burtis have trekked to Everest base camp in Nepal and climbed Kilimanjaro in Africa. Most recently Dr. Winslow joined Drs. Fox and Burtis to hike the Inca trail to Machu Picchu in Peru.
textAfterTable: Please note: Appointment Requests are reviewed weekdays at 3 pm.  Please allow at least 24 hours for your request to be processed.
